snippet: The country’s third-largest poultry producer has started an ad campaign to defend its continued use of antibiotics as many companies move away from the practice....
abstract: Sanderson Farms, country's third-largest poultry producer, launches new advertising campaign that defends company's use of antibiotics in healthy chickens; firm executives say there is no credible science proving practice creates antibiotic-resistant bacteria, and says method lets them raise poultry with less resources.
lead_paragraph: The country’s third-largest poultry producer has started an ad campaign to defend its continued use of antibiotics as many companies move away from the practice.

headline.main: Poultry Producer Sanderson Farms Stands Its Ground: It’s Proud to Use Antibiotics
headline.print_headline: Major Poultry Producer Defends Its Use of Antibiotics
